content.description: Start matched on jug low and left on the arete. Trend up and right through a set of thin right facing edges. Move up to a series of barely there friction patches to move out to a good pinch higher up and a bout 1' in from the arete. From that pinch continue up the arete and top out as for Yek.
content.location: Left arete of the Yek boulder. Right on the trail in between the entrance to the Troll Toll and the large cave. Down the hill a bit from the overhangs.

content.description: Sit start at red spray paint "Yek" and climb up and right.
content.location: to the left of troll toll before entering tunnel

content.description: Start on the corner of the long boulder underneath the troll toll roof. Scrunch yourself up and pull feet on around the left corner and make moves along the seam just underneath the troll toll boulder above you. Move out right from the roof onto the right side of the boulder and traverse to the right edge with huge shelf foot and top out.
content.protection: A few pads at the start and maybe one at the finish.
content.location: Starts opposite of the finish of Question three. Perched atop the rock at the entrance of the Troll Toll. Moves right into the small cave.

content.description: Somehow climb from under the troll toll and top it out...
traverse under the troll toll boulder, scrunch your bum up and shoot out to the back side of the boulder without dabbing on the pointed rock under it. bump up then top out on the troll toll boulder.

Move to the right towards the overhang and switch to the other side once at it. Top out is at the far left side of the overhang, where there is a separation between it and the other wall. The wall to the left of the top out point is not on.
content.location: Start is to the left of the "J.J's Cave" tag, right above the indentation in the rock

content.description: Cool rock used to make a tunnel
